title: Club tag won't show???
body: I created a club tag, currently have 5+ members, and I set my club as active... but it still won't show! Any advice?? Has this happened to anyone else?

replies.body:
From looking at your club tag, it appears that you added some special characters in it.  The client typically doesn't support special characters and may be the root cause as to why it isn't appearing correctly.  We unfortunately can't change club names/tags at all, so you would need to create a brand new Club.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any further questions!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Mm9iEanp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-06T23:05:20.986+0000)
>
> From looking at your club tag, it appears that you added some special characters in it.  The client typically doesn't support special characters and may be the root cause as to why it isn't appearing correctly.  We unfortunately can't change club names/tags at all, so you would need to create a brand new Club.
> 
> I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any further questions!

Ok, but now I switched my active club tag to another club I'm in (that doesn't have special characters) and it still won't show. So... what's the issue now?
